text: Vera Lapko was the defending champion, but was no longer eligible to participate. Ukrainian Marta Kostyuk won the title, defeating Rebeka Masarova in the final, 7–5, 1–6, 6–4. == Seeds == == Draw == === Finals === === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== ===Bottom half=== ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ====Fifth Qualifier==== ====Sixth Qualifier==== ====Seventh Qualifier==== ====Eighth Qualifier==== == External links == * Main draw at ausopen.com * Draw at itftennis.com Girls' Singles Australian Open, 2017 Girls' Singles
title: 2017 Australian Open – Girls' Singles
